ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Good duo for dungeon play?
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically they just work as a couple and fight together. They agree to be fighting partners and such. I recently got to perform a wedding as I was the only
ygData.messageBody:
Basically they just work as a couple and fight together. They agree to be
fighting partners and such. I recently got to perform a wedding as I was the
only available cleric the couple could find. :-) The ceremony was short but
sweet. And then they passed around wedding cake and cookies. My parting gift
to them was the blessing of Heroic Bond. :-)
Beyond that I don't know much more as I never do the dating type of
roleplay. I just don't know how.
luv,
-Su


>
>
>
>
> I recently met a couple of ppl who were getting married in-game, im
curious as to what this means, what the implications are game-wise etc.
>
> does anyone know where thier is any information on this part of the
roleplaying thing?, i tried a search on google, boy that was a
misstake-nothing but ppl whining cos there marriage's broke up:( . anyway if
anyone can provide any information at all regarding in-game marriages.
>
> Thanks
>
>
